description: Scientists report that Earth will briefly spin faster on July 9, 22, and August 5, shortening those summer days by 1.3 to 1.5 milliseconds. Though undetectable in daily life, this shift offers clues to how lunar gravity and seasonal changes affect planetary dynamics. Experts note that while timekeeping systems like GPS are unaffected, this rare speed-up may one day prompt a “negative leap second” to sync atomic clocks. It’s a subtle, fascinating reminder of how our planet’s rhythm change over time.
title: Earth’s Spin to Speed Up Briefly, Causing Shorter Days This Summer

description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has unveiled the “Cosmic Owl,” a jaw-dropping image of two colliding ring galaxies forming a structure that resembles an owl’s face. This double-ring formation is extraordinarily rare, and the event is shedding light on galaxy evolution, black hole dynamics, and rapid star formation. Led by Ph.D. student Mingyu Li of Tsinghua University, researchers say this discovery serves as a powerful lab for studying how galaxies interact and grow. The “Cosmic Owl” may also help scientists understand how young galaxies amassed stars at astonishing speeds.
title: James Webb Telescope Spots Rare ‘Cosmic Owl’ Formed by Colliding Galaxies

description: NASA’s Ax-4 mission is set to return to Earth on July 14 after two and a half weeks aboard the International Space Station. The four-member crew, led by Peggy Whitson, includes the first astronauts from India, Poland, and Hungary. They completed over 60 science experiments ranging from algae-based life support to wearable nanomaterials. Expedition 73 astronauts helped prep Dragon for departure, including securing blood and saliva samples. Dragon will carry 580 pounds of science cargo and splash down off the California coast, concluding this groundbreaking international research mission.
title: Ax-4 Astronauts to Return from ISS with 580 Pounds of Science Cargo

description: Google executive Sameer Samat confirmed during an interview that the company is going to integrate ChromeOS and Android into a single platform. This comes months after a report revealed that the US-based tech giant is planning to turn ChromeOS into Android for tablets to compete with Apple’s iPads, which run on iPadOS.
title: Google to Integrate ChromeOS and Android into a Single Platform: Report

description: MIT’s new AI lets soft robots move precisely from just one image input—cutting cost, complexity, and reliance on rigid hardware.
title: MIT Develops Low-Resource AI System to Control Soft Robots with Just One Image

description: NASA’s Mars Sample Return Mission is at risk due to skyrocketing costs, but a new cost-efficient proposal from Lockheed Martin could save the mission. By reusing technology from the InSight lander, the plan promises to bring back Mars samples at a fraction of the expected $11 billion.
title: NASA’s Mars Sample Return Mission May Survive with Lockheed Martin’s Low-Cost Proposal

description: Oru Yemanin Kadhal Kadhai is a Tamil comedy drama that stars Dulquer Salmaan in the lead role. The movie revolves around a young man who denies marriage before falling in love. One day, he encounters a missing person’s photo and feels a spark. That’s when his journey begins. Will he find the love?
title: Oru Yemanin Kadhal Kadhai Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: What You Need to Know

description: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 brings discounts in all categories, including smartphones, laptops, gaming consoles, PC accessories, tablets, home appliances and smartwatches. The annual discount sale has listed storage devices from brands like Western Digital and Seagate with up to 70 percent discount.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Deals on External Hard Drives, Pen Drives

description: Leaked images of lens protection covers for the iPhone 17 series hint at possible colour options. The iPhone 17 may come in black, grey, silver, light blue, green, and purple shades, while the iPhone 17 Air could launch in black, silver, light gold, and blue colourways. The iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max might feature black, grey, silver, dark blue, and orange variants. Leaks also suggest a redesigned rear camera layout, aluminium frames, and MagSafe support for the Pro models.
title: iPhone 17 Series Colour Options Spotted via Leaked Lens Protection Covers

description: OpenAI announced another delay for the release of its open-source artificial intelligence (AI) model. On Saturday, the company’s CEO, Sam Altman, said that due to additional time required to run safety tests, the release of the AI model was delayed indefinitely. This is the second such delay, after the company postponed the release in June.
title: OpenAI Says Its Open-Source Reasoning AI Model Is Delayed Indefinitely

description: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 will end tonight. Multiple double-door refrigerators are listed with discounted prices in the ongoing Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025. They are listed with bank discounts, no-cost EMI options and coupon discounts. Buyers can avail of exchange offers.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Last-Minute Deals on Double Door Refrigerators

description: Amazon Prime Day sale 2025 is coming to an end in just a few hours. The annual sale event for Prime subscribers began on July 12 and is going to conclude at midnight on July 14. However, if you were busy during the weekend, there is still time for you to take advantage of the last-minute deals still available on the platform.

description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series is expected to use the codenames NPA1, NPA2, and NPA3, with “NPA” standing for “Next Paradigm.” NPA1 and NPA3 likely refer to the Galaxy S26 and S26 Ultra, while NPA2 could be the S26+ or S26 Edge. The S26+ or Edge may get a 50-megapixel ultrawide camera, a big jump from the S25 series’ 12-megapixel ultrawide shooter. The S26 Ultra could feature a 1/1.1-inch 200-megapixel Sony sensor and a 50-megapixel 5x telephoto lens.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26+ or Galaxy S26 Edge May Launch With 50-Megapixel Ultrawide Camera

description: The Vivo X Fold 5 comes with a sleek and premium design. The foldable smartphone is one of the slimmest and lightest foldable phones available on the market right now. The device also features a sharp and vibrant cover and main displays. The cameras have improved as well, and so has the user interface. Check out the first impressions of Vivo X Fold 5 to know more about the new features of the foldable device.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 First Impressions

description: Companies like Canon, Fujifilm, and Panasonic have listed their cameras and accessories with up to 75 percent discount on the Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025. Models like Fujifilm X100XVI and Insta360 X5 are listed with price cuts. Buyers can also avail bank-related offers, no-cost EMI offers and coupon-based discounts.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Top Deals on Photography Cameras and Accessories

description: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2026 began on Saturday and goes on till midnight today. The e-commerce giant’s ongoing sale is exclusive to Amazon Prime members in India. Among the listed items during the sale are headphones from top brands like Bose, JBL, and Sony which are listed with price cuts.

description: Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon SoC for wearables is in the works and could potentially boost the performance of smartwatches that will run the next generation of the Wear OS, as per a report. The chip is said to have been codenamed Aspen and carry the model number SW6100.
title: Qualcomm Working On New Snapdragon SW6100 SoC for Wearables: Report

description: Apple Smart Home Hub, with the codename J490, could launch in 2026, around the same time the company unveils its new Siri, according to a report by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. The device, which was allegedly supposed to launch in March 2025, relies heavily on Siri.
title: Apple Smart Home Hub Launch Delayed to 2026: Mark Gurman

description: Google is said to be rolling out chat search functionality in Gemini for Android. A social media post shared a screenshot of the new search bar in the Android version of the artificial intelligence (AI) app. The feature is currently available on both iOS as well as on the web, but it has not been made available to Android users.
title: Google Said to Be Adding a Search Bar to Gemini’s Android App

description: The Realme 15 Pro 5G will feature a 7,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging and a slim 7.69mm body. It will come with a 4D curve+ display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a 6,500 nits peak brightness and Gorilla Glass protection. Powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, it is claimed to support 120fps gaming, GT Boost 3.0, and Gaming Coach 2.0 features. It will be equipped with AI editing tools like AI Edit Genie and AI Party.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Display, Battery, Charging Features Revealed Ahead of July 24 India Launch

description: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla’s farewell message from the ISS during the Axiom-4 mission was a stirring tribute to India’s space journey. Echoing Rakesh Sharma’s iconic 1984 phrase, Shukla said that from orbit, India appears “full of ambition, fearless, confident and full of pride.” His 18-day stay aboard the ISS included over 60 experiments, with seven led by Indian scientists on topics such as muscle loss and plant biology.
title: Shubhanshu Shukla Bids Farewell from ISS, Honours India’s Space Legacy

description: Shoppers can find considerable discounts on ACs from top brands in this year's Amazon Prime Day Sale. Several Energy-efficient models from top brands like LG, Lloyd, Blue Star, and Godrej are up for grabs at reduced rates during the sale.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Last-Minute Deals on 1.5-Ton Air Conditioners

description: Shopping for a new laptop? The Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 is live till today in INdia where you can find top deals on best-selling laptops. The e-commerce giant has rolled out lucrative price cuts on best-selling laptop models from top brands such as Apple, Asus, Dell, and HP.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale: Top Deals on Best-Selling Laptops from Apple, Asus and Dell

description: Google is reportedly working on an artificial intelligence (AI) feature for Gboard. As per a report, the new feature is dubbed SmartEdit and it is aimed as an enhancement for the voice typing feature in Gboard. The Mountain View-based tech giant’s keyboard app already allows users to edit or delete a portion of the text using voice commands; however, with SmartEdit, the app is said to let users make more complex edits.
title: Google Working On New  AI Feature for Gboard to Improve Voice Typing Feature: Report

description: The Vivo X200 FE is the new compact smartphone from the company that comes loaded with a host of interesting features and specifications. The smartphone features a slim profile and offers a compact 6.31-inch display that is bright and vibrant. The handset is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ processor and offers a clean OS experience. Check out the first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Vivo X200 FE First Impressions

description: The Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 ends today, July 14! It began on July 12 as a three-day sale event, offering buyers an opportunity to get big discounts on a wide range of electronic products. During the Amazon sale, buyers can purchase PlayStation 5 Disc Edition, PlayStation 5 Digital Edition, Sony Pulse Explore wireless earbuds, DualSense Wireless Controller, and other accessories with discounts of up to 20 percent.

The e-commerce website is providing additional bank discounts and exchange offers for shoppers. The sale is exclusive for Amazon Prime subscribers to access these deals.

That means buyers only have a limited time to purchase all of the products in their wishlist at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates. Let us take a look at the best end-of-season-deals on ACs on the last day of the Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale: End of Season Deals on ACs from Carrier, Daikin, LG, and More Brands

description: Samsung has reportedly provided some clarity over the future of Galaxy AI features after the end of 2025. So far, the South Korean tech giant has maintained that the artificial intelligence (AI) tools and features that make up the Galaxy AI suite are only free to use till 2025. The company never officially confirmed if these features would be paywalled starting in 2026, or if they would continue to be available for free.
title: Samsung Confirms Some Galaxy AI Features Will Remain Free After 2025: Report

description: Several reports with leaked specifications of a new Fan Edition (FE) phone, Galaxy S25 FE, have been circulating on the web. The handset could feature the Exynos 2400 chip paired with 8GB RAM. It is said to sport a 6.7-inch AMOLED touchscreen with a variable refresh rate of 1Hz to 120Hz, which means it's an LTPO panel. The phone could also feature a 4,900mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Key Specifications Leaked; Could Feature Larger Battery, LTPO Display

description: The Vivo X Fold 5 has an 8.03-inch foldable AMOLED inner display and a 6.53-inch AMOLED cover screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and a 4,500 nits local peak brightness. The phone sports three 50-megapixel rear cameras, including a telephoto shooter with 3x optical zoom and an ultrawide camera. It gets a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and a 6,000mAh battery. The X Fold 5 measures 4.3mm in thickness when unfolded and weighs 217g.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Launched in India With 8.03-Inch Foldable Screen, 50-Megapixel Telephoto Camera

description: The Vivo X200 FE was unveiled in India on Monday alongside the Vivo X Fold 5, expanding the Vivo X200 lineup in the country. It features a 6.31-inch AMOLED screen and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset. The handset houses a 6,500mAh battery supporting 90W wired fast charging. For photography, it gets a Zeiss-enhanced triple rear camera setup with a 50-megapixel main sensor and a 50-megapixel front-facing camera for selfies.
title: Vivo X200 FE Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC, 6,500mAh Battery

description: Prices for the Google Pixel 10 series have leaked online. The new leak suggests that Google may retain similar pricing to last year’s models. The Pixel 10 is said to start at EUR 899 for the 128GB storage variant. The leak also includes the alleged pricing of the Pixel Buds 2a.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Buds 2a Pricing Leaked Online Ahead of Launch

description: The iQOO Z10R official landing page is live on iQOO India's site. It teases a pill-shaped dual rear camera module with Aura Light and 4K video recording support. Rumours suggest that the handset may launch in July under Rs. 20,000 in the country. The phone may feature a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC paired with 12GB RAM and a 6.77-inch full-HD+ 120Hz quad-curved OLED display.
title: iQOO Z10R India Launch Teased; Listed on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC

Additionally, using specific partner bank cards yields a 10 percent instant discount. You'll need a Prime subscription to take advantage of these deals.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 Live Updates: Top Last Minute Deals on Phones, Tablets and More on Day 3

description: Nvidia’s GeForce RTX 50-series GPUs are available in India, but finding one in stock might be the real challenge. Sitting in the middle of the lineup, the GeForce RTX 5080 delivers impressive performance at a lower price than the top-end RTX 5090. Among the available options, the Inno3D GeForce RTX 5080 iChill X3 stands out as an overclocked variant with robust thermal performance, thanks to its triple-fan setup and a thicker vapour chamber. In this review, we break down its features and performance.
title: Inno3D GeForce RTX 5080 iChill X3 Review: Powerful and Cool

description: Qualcomm will host a Snapdragon XR Day in India next week, the company has announced. At the event, the US-based chipmaker will showcase the latest technologies in the world of augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and mixed reality (MR) — all encompassed and interpolated under the umbrella term of extended reality (XR). The Snapdragon XR Day is part of its “Snapdragon for India” initiative for which the company has already announced the Snapdragon Auto Day the week after.
title: Qualcomm Announces Snapdragon XR Day in India to Showcase Future of AR, VR Technologies on July 21

description: The Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 in India began on July 12 and is set to end today, July 14. Currently, there are lucrative deals on a wide range of products across different categories.
